name: About Section
description: Introduction section with organization story and mission

content.title: About {{org_name}}
content.subtitle: Our Story
content.body: Founded with a passion for youth sports, {{org_name}} is dedicated to developing young athletes through teamwork, discipline, and sportsmanship. We provide a positive environment where players can grow both on and off the field.
content.mission: To empower young athletes to reach their full potential through quality coaching, competitive play, and character development.
